text_block_list.text: New Year's had passed. Cesario had challenged the 『Kanchiku Sho』――and she had won!
(Alright……! She's won in a race with several Triple Crown participants, and it was even a medium distance 2000m race. With this……!)
Congratulations on winning the 『Kanchiku Sho』, Cesario. As I thought, it seems like your strength is more towards slightly longer distances.
Congratulations on winning the 『Kanchiku Sho』, Cesario. As I thought, it seems like your strength is more towards slightly longer distances.
I want you to enter another major race in preparation for your main goal of the 『Oka Sho』. So let's have you run in the 1800m 『Flower Cup』 next!
And then Kraft. You can show more of your abilities in shorter races. So let's have you run in the 1400m 『Fillies' Review』.
choice_data_list: Let's work to our next goals!

text_block_list.text: And then Kraft. You can show more of your abilities in shorter races. So let's have you run in the 1400m 『Fillies' Review』.
choice_data_list: Let's work to our next goals!

text_block_list.name: Kraft & Cesario
text_block_list.text: Yes!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (After the Fillies' Review, the 『Oka Sho』 is the month after……And that's the first time…… I'll face Cesario in an official race)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (The first time, with all my strength! That I'll be able to battle against Cesario……! I'm looking forward to it……I don't think I can wait……!)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Allllright! I need to put my all in to training―― Wait, huh? ……Over there, that's……

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa…… Okay……――Haaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: !! ――Aaaaaaahh!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (Cesario!? Amazing……against Special Week-san……a senpai from the Golden Generation, she can keep up……!?)

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Not yet, not yet……! Yaaaaaaaaaーーーー!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (Spe-san……! How sharp……so that's the finishing strength of the Uma Musume called the "Supreme Command of Japan"……! ……But――)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa――! Haaaaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (Against that strength! Against that speed, she's still hanging in……! She's evolving! By chasing Spe-san and learning more and more――)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Can I……as a leader, can I out run that? Against……a finish like that――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (Not good! 『Looking forward to it』? Now's not the time to be thinking naively about that……I need to get more serious!)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (Against a last spurt like that…… I need to do something to fight back……!)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: ……Then, I need to find an Uma Musume with overwhelming finishing strength too――……that's right, in that case!!
Hmm, hmm, hmmmmm~……♪ So busy, so busy. Let's see, the next materials I need now are~……

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Ah, I found you……! Um, excuse me!! ――Sweep Tosho-san!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: I know it's a bit sudden! W-will you……! Will you do some parallel running with me!?

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Ha? What are you saying all of a sudden? No way!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: So quick!? U-um, can you think about it a little bit……? I really want to……I need to get stronger……!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: No waaay. It sounds annoying. And, right now I'm really busy.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Au……I-is that so? Uuu……no……no even then, can you please reconsider?

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Hey, are you even listening to me!? I said no way, didn't I!? Nooo waaay!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: But, but! Can't you do something!? Please, Sweep-saaaaa~~~n!!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: No means nooooo! You're so persistent! What's wrong with you～～～～!?

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: ――Now, put the small blue flowers here, and the bulbs in that box over there in to a bottle. Right now!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Okay! ……Um, and so, after I finish helping with this……!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: I get it. All I have to do is run for you right!? Geez-…… you're really stubborn, you know. Just saying no is more exhausting!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Ahaha, actually, I get told that alot……sorry~. So, these flowers……and bulbs……!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Okay, all done! ……is all this, preparation for a new large-scale magic?

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Hm? Well, it does kind of give off that feeling…… Oh, so you, know about something like this?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Of course……! Sweep Tosho-san. ……you're an Uma Musume who's shown us what 『Race Magic』 is.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Last year……before challenging the Triple Tiara rotation, you said something like this: 『This boring world, I'll change it』.

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: 『Triple Crown Uma Musume are stronger than Triple Tiara Uma Musume, is what you're saying~?]

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: 『When they compete together in Senior class races, the Tiara girls have always lost. That's what it seems like when you think about it rationally?』

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: 『What's with that, it's so booooooring! That's something an idiot would conclude!』

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: 『In that case, I'll show all of you! First, I'll start by competing in the Triple Tiara rotation――』

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: 『And then, in the Senior Class! And even in a Grand Prix, the Takarazuka Kinen! I'll compete against the Triple Crown girls, and win!』

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: 『And then, for idiots like you, I'll even cast my magic. Races aren't a boring place like that!』

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: 『It doesn't matter if it's the Triple Crown or the Triple Tiara! Strong Uma Musume are strong! I'll show all of you!』

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: That press conference……I've watched it so many times. Again, and again……each and every time, it resonated in my heart.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: 『Triple Crown or Triple Tiara, doesn't matter』 『A strong Uma Musume is strong』……! I believe that too. I want to prove that too. That's why……!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Please! I need to continue evolving now. For the 『Oka Sho』……so I can beat my rival……!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Hmmm? ……so you're not just persistent, you're a kind of interesting girl too.

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: So, you're saying that you've fallen under my spell? ……In that case, having you stay weak would be troubling!

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: I guess it can't be helped. I suppose it's fine to start some parallel running!

text_block_list.name: Kraft & Sweep
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaaaaaa! Yaaaaaーーーー!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (Kuu……! No……she's going to pass me……!!)

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Fuuu……! Well what do you know? You're pretty good! Your start is on point, and you hung in there quite well at the end.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: T-thank you very much. But, in the end you were still able to pass me……

text_block_list.name: Sweep Tosho
text_block_list.text: Mu. Now you've said it……Against Sweepy, that's expected! And besides, I debuted a year earlier than you!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: That may be true but……! That won't be enough. If I can't keep up with someone that's able to finish like you then……!

text_block_list.name: Spe & Cesario
text_block_list.text: Haaaaaa……!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (Against that finish……against that sharpness! If I stay like this……honestly, no matter how far in front I go, I don't think it'll be enough……!)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: (I can't imagine it!! I can't imagine winning against Cesario……!)

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Once more……please, Sweep-san. Like this, I don't think it'll be enough……!
